results.title: Early-Onset Bilateral Severe Valvular Regurgitation After Mediastinal Radiotherapy in Hodgkin Lymphoma Survivors: Should We Screen Prior to 10 Years After Mediastinal Radiotherapy?
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was started on a regimen of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@, and her symptoms improved significantly within 4 days of starting medical therapy.

citations.NLM: Mishra T, Ahmed A, Shokr M, Rashed A, Yassin AS, Kottam A. Early-Onset Bilateral Severe Valvular Regurgitation After Mediastinal Radiotherapy in Hodgkin Lymphoma Survivors: Should We Screen Prior to 10 Years After Mediastinal Radiotherapy? Ochsner J. 2019 Fall;19(3):252-255. PMID: 31528137
